value.title: Set Power BI Data Color   All Visuals to Follow Same Color for the Same Data Point
value.excerpt: You can set the color in every visual in Power BI easily. You can also set the color of multiple visuals at the same time using Themes. value.title: Showing Ranking in a Visual in Power BI using RANKX DAX function
